verses.verse: When I came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> excellence <S%G5247><s%> of speech <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> proclaiming <S%G2605><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I determined <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to know <S%G1492><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> preaching <S%G2782><s%> were not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> persuasive <S%G3981><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of human <S%G442><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> demonstration <S%G585><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of power, <S%G1411><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> wouldn't <S%G3361><s%> stand <S%G5600><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

We speak <S%G2980><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> however, <S%G1161><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are full grown; <S%G5046><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> a wisdom <S%G4678><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are coming to nothing. <S%G2673><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s wisdom <S%G4678><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a mystery, <S%G3466><s%> the wisdom that has been hidden, <S%G613><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> foreordained <S%G4309><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the worlds <S%G165><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> has known. <S%G1097><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> had <S%G1487><s%> they known <S%G1097><s%> it, <S%G4717><s%> they wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G302><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of glory. <S%G1391><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Things which an <S%G3739><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> see, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> an ear <S%G3775><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> <S%G3756><s%> which <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> enter <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> these God <S%G2316><s%> has prepared <S%G2090><s%> for those <S%G3588><s%> who love <S%G25><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> to us, <S%G2254><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> them through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G846><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> searches <S%G2045><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> yes, <S%G2532><s%> the deep things <S%G899><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> among men <S%G444><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of a man, <S%G444><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the man, <S%G444><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him? <S%G846><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> so, <S%G3779><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> received, <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we might know <S%G1492><s%> the things that <S%G3588><s%> were freely given <S%G5483><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Which things <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we speak, <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> which man <S%G442><s%>'s wisdom <S%G4678><s%> teaches, <S%G1318><s%> but <S%G235><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> teaches, <S%G1318><s%> comparing <S%G4793><s%> spiritual things <S%G4152><s%> with spiritual things. <S%G4152><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the natural <S%G5591><s%> man <S%G444><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'s Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G2076><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3756><s%> can't <S%G1410><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> them, <S%G3754><s%> because they are spiritually <S%G4153><s%> discerned. <S%G350><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> is spiritual <S%G4152><s%> <S%G99999><s%> discerns <S%G350><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> is judged <S%G350><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> no one. <S%G3762><s%>

"For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has known <S%G1097><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he should instruct <S%G4822><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>" But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s mind. <S%G3563><s%>
